title: Game Freezes on Deaths And Etc.
body:
My game freezes sometimes whenever a die or something else dies. It does not happen all of the time but it happens enough for it to get annoying. I normally get around 150 fps on max settings. I decided to put all of my settings on the lowest to see if that fixes it and I am still experiencing the issue. 
 Specs i guess
Intel Core i5-4690l CPU 3.50GHz 
16 gb ram
nvidia geforce gtx 970

I can run most games decently maybe my computer is just crapping out. This is the only game I have this issue with.

replies.body:
Way to rub dirt in the wounds when your champion dies -_-'. 

If those freezes only happen when your champion dies, there might be some kind of game asset that isn't working quite right. Let's try running a repair through the client options to make sure you've got a stable version of the game. Test it out in a custom/practice game and hit me back if that doesn't do the trick!
